description: Sets the active organization for the current user session. The active organization determines the context for subsequent operations and data access.

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization to set as active

404.description: Not Found - Organization not found or user is not a member

x-specs.given: An authenticated user who is member of multiple organizations
x-specs.then: Returns 200 OK and updates session with active organization
